      static NurbsSurface NurbsCreator.createSwungSurface(NurbsCurve proj, NurbsCurve traj, float alpha)
      Creates a NurbsSurface by swinging a profile NurbsCurve in the XZ plane around a trajectory curve in the XY plane.
      static NurbsSurface NurbsCreator.extrudeCurve(NurbsCurve curve, Vec3D extrude)
      Perform a linear extrusion of the given NurbsCurve along the supplied vector to produce a new NurbsSurface.
